name: Preserver
aura: Increases Ally HP in All Battles by 17%.

skills.desc: Places a 7.5% [Continuous Heal] buff and a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is proportional to this Champion's MAX HP.
skills.name: Recuperate
skills.books:
Level 2: Shield +5%
Level 3: Shield +5%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
